task.summary: Default task
Fixed the kill media player on rotation
Implemented a repeat button
Implemented a repeat button
Fixed the played counter on rotation
-Completed srubBar interaction -Added a preview and track duration
-Completed srubBar interaction -Added a preview and track duration
Implemented Foreground Service
Implemented grayed out previous and next buttons
Clean up
Synced top 10 track with player, so when user changes track in player its reflected in the top 10 list
Added now playing button
Replaced interface conection with broadcast
Rolled back
Added notification play, pause, repeat, previous, and next
Added album image, artist, album and track name
Notification usable on lock screen
Added menu setting screen to enable/disable notifications
Added share currently playing track
Share intent current track to external Spotify URL
Move image from mipmap to drawables
Update logo to higher resolution
Setup the two pane screen
Added shared perference to set two pane variable
Added dialog framework
Completed 95% of dialog
Change notification visiblity level to PUBLIC
Fixed crashing when Pausing the broadcast, move to onStop(). Removed Buffering dialog from PlayerFragment
